original_title: Indian envoy calls on President-elect, congratulates on election win
original_body_lines: Indian High Commissioner to Sri Lanka, Santosh Jha, yesterday met with President-elect Anura Kumara Dissanayake and conveyed congratulations on behalf of India’s leadership.
During the meeting, Jha extended India’s well-wishes for Dissanayake’s victory and affirmed the country’s commitment to strengthening bilateral relations.
